metadata.title: CVE-2024-42124 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: qedf: Make qedf_execute_tmf() non-preemptibleStop calling smp_processor_id() from preemptible code inqedf_execute_tmf90.  This results in BUG_ON() when running an RT kernel.[ 659.343280] BUG: using smp_processor_id() in preemptible [00000000] code:sg_reset/3646[ 659.343282] caller is qedf_execute_tmf+0x8b/0x360 [qedf]

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-48.48').
linux-aws package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-1018.20').
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
